name: Hajime Taki
description: Taki is a representative for the Defense Solutions department of theArasaka Corporation. In2077, he was due to meet with twoMilitechrepresentativesatKonpeki PlazainNight Cityas part of acorporatearms deal, though he would never meet with them due to the events transpiring at the hotel. At the hotel's restaurant, Taki can be overheard talking with the minister of an unknown country, with whom he is making a deal for twenty late-modelArasaka Daikani.
